name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlanta Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. TV reception was poor at best.
reviews.title: Disappointed
Would stay here again
reviews.text: 2. Ice machine was broken on my floor.
3. Vending machine took my $ by the broken vending machine.\
reviews.title: Average airport hotel

reviews.text: 4. Room was smelled like a bar.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay
Not the best
reviews.text: 5. Front desk was not helpful w/ basic driving directions.

reviews.title: Average Stay
reviews.text: Just an average stay. Nothing special, but it covered the basics. My visit doesn't inspire any strong emotions one way or the other. If you need a place to stay, and this is convenient to your destination, I guess it's just fine. If you're looking for something special - well - you'd better keep looking!

description: DoubleTree Atlanta Airport is 1 mile from the Hartsfield Jackson Airport and only 7 miles from downtown Atlanta. We're close to both the Georgia Convention Center and Delta World Headquarters. We offer dining for breakfast, lunch and dinner at our Seasons Bakery and Grill and in-room dining. We have ample event space. Other amenities include complimentary WiFi, a pool, a fitness center and a business center.
